about_the_game:
Ghost of Oblivion is a strategy game in which you need to create a deck of cards and defend against waves of opponents using different tactics by combining them. Armies of evil spirits have attacked our world and you have to fight back the hordes of monsters!

To create units, drag cards onto the battlefield using your mouse. To win you must destroy all enemies.

Game Features:
- nice pixel graphics;
- 16 levels. At each level you will face different opponents and as you progress through the game you will receive new cards and modify your deck and develop new tactics;
- 4 locations;
- 14 cards. Each card has its own unique abilities and capabilities.
Unit cards attack enemies by either shooting them or fighting them in melee
Spell cards can be used to damage enemies, slow them down, or heal soldiers;
- Ability to develop different tactics and strategies to combat different opponents.
